snippet.title: Before They Leave gameplay clip
snippet.description:
Download for Free:
https://elliskim.itch.io/before-they-leave
https://gamejolt.com/games/beforetheyleave/294913

Before They Leave is a visual novel short story following Samantha fiddler, a depressed girl in the last year of high school, hanging out with her friends one afternoon in a boba tea cafe. Choose how she answers her friends and fight depressive thoughts to get through the day!

Art, Writing, and Programming by Ellis Kim (http://twitter.com/timefiddler)
Music by Lillian Yee (https://soundcloud.com/lillianwy)

This game is a prequel to the webcomic "Time Fiddler," which is about time traveling girls who fall in love and have problematic crushes along the way.
